title: Define Project Scope and Requirements
description: Clearly document the project's objectives, features, and functionalities for a quantum real estate prediction tool. This should include detailed specifications of the desired functionality, performance requirements, security considerations, and any other relevant details.

title: Research Quantum Computing Techniques for Real Estate Prediction
description: Investigate quantum computing techniques and algorithms that can be applied to real estate prediction.

title: Design Quantum Algorithm for Real Estate Prediction
description: Develop a quantum algorithm that can predict real estate trends with high precision.
dependencies: Research Quantum Computing Techniques for Real Estate Prediction

title: Create Project Architecture
description: Design the overall structure and architecture of the gestionImmobilierQuantum application.

title: Develop Frontend Interface for User Interaction
description: Design and implement an intuitive user interface for the gestionImmobilierQuantum application.

title: Develop Backend Services for Data Processing and Quantum Computation
description: Develop the necessary backend services to process data, run quantum computations, and generate predictions.

title: Establish Database Structure and Integration
description: Design the database structure for storing real estate data and integrating it with the application.

title: Implement DevOps and Deployment Strategies
description: Set up the necessary DevOps tools and strategies for the development, testing, and deployment of gestionImmobilierQuantum.

title: Perform Unit and Integration Tests
description: Test individual components and the overall functionality of gestionImmobilierQuantum.
dependencies: Develop Frontend Interface for User Interaction
Develop Backend Services for Data Processing and Quantum Computation

title: Secure the Application
description: Implement security measures to protect user data and maintain system integrity.

title: Document and Maintain Technical Documentation
description: Write and maintain technical documentation for gestionImmobilierQuantum, including design decisions, code explanations, and usage guidelines.
